title: High Grade
notes: The verse normally ends with the riff. 'riff' and 'trans-to-break' consist of the order of the notes played.

sections.chorus: gm gm gm gm | gm gm gm F | gm gm gm gm | gm gm F F
sections.verse: gm gm gm gm | gm gm gm F | gm gm gm gm | gm gm F F
sections.instrumental: gm gm gm gm | gm gm gm F | gm gm gm gm | gm gm F F
sections.riff: G Bb C D F G
sections.trans-to-break: G Bb C C# D Bb C
